mapper.insert: insert into reservation(reservationid, spaceid, memberid, startdate, enddate, status, paystatus, price, prepay, reserve_time) values(seq_reservation.nextval,#{spaceId},#{memberId},#{startDate}, #{endDate}, 1, #{payStatus}, #{price}, #{prepay},TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'))
mapper.select: select reservationid from reservation where #{startDate} <= enddate and #{endDate} >= startdate
select (TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') - TO_DATE(reserve_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'))*24 from reservation where reservationid=#{reservationId}
mapper.delete: update reservation set status = 2 where reservationid=#{reservationId}
